summary: Experienced Full Stack Software Developer with 5+ years of expertise in building scalable web applications. Proficient in Java, Python, React, and AWS. Passionate about clean code, system design, and mentoring junior developers.

skills.items: Java, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL, HTML, CSS
Spring Boot, Django, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, Flask
Git, Docker, Jenkins, AWS, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis
Agile, SCRUM, Microservices, RESTful APIs, Test-Driven Development

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description:
Led development of microservices architecture serving 500K+ users
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%
Mentored team of 5 junior developers and conducted code reviews
Optimized database queries improving application performance by 40%

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description:
Developed REST APIs using Spring Boot handling 100K requests/day
Built responsive UI components using React.js and Material-UI
Participated in Agile/SCRUM ceremonies and sprint planning
Implemented comprehensive unit tests achieving 85% code coverage

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description:
Developed full-stack features for e-commerce platform
Created database schemas and wrote efficient SQL queries
Contributed to frontend development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Fixed 50+ bugs and improved code maintainability

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
